posts.description: Twitter / sarahjeong: Bitcoin billboard at Telegraph ...
posts.extended: RT @OaklandElle: OMG. Nooooo! XD RT @sarahjeong: Bitcoin billboard at Telegraph and 59th in Oakland.
RT @williamcander: Never forget Oscar, Trayvon, Renisha, Jordan, or anyone we lost --'Oscar Grant Called Me Grandma'  #NewYearsRevolution
